title: 109_hr5973
content: Hydrogen Transportation Wins Over Growing Reliance on Oil Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for 50 of the cost of acquiring and installing qualified hydrogen-powered vehicle refueling property . Terminates such credit after 2013. Excludes income from the sale of hydrogen fuel sold at retail for use in a hydrogen vehicle from taxpayer gross income. Terminates such tax exclusion after 2014.
